name: Welcome to Café Indica
description: Put down all your worries and pick up a cup of coffee to enjoy the Café Indica experience

name: Style Quiz
description: Take a style quiz to better understand your personal style

name: Browse
description: Browse through styles and packages, save what you love

name: Book a Designer
description: Talk to our expert designers to understand the naunces of interior design

name: Shortlist
description: Shortlist the designs and furniture you love best

name: Visualize
description: Get 3D views of the final design so that you can be 100% sure before placing the order

name: Place Order
description: Place the final order after finalizing the specifications

name: Sit Back
description: Sit back! ...Your order is being processed and your home will be ready in 45 days

name: Move in
description: Move into your fantabulously delicious home, Coffee, anyone ???
